Quickly developed a JS Youtube Player

Posted on May 10, 2012 by Anthony Dillon

I wanted to create a free online Spotify style site that used youtube to play music in the background. Here it is in its very early stages of development.

The main problem is filtering the restricted videos from the search, which I’m still working on :S
